name: The Orb Whisperer (10 player)
descr: Defeat the Blood Council without anyone in the raid taking more than 23,000 spell damage in a single hit in 10-player mode.
tooltip:
The Orb Whisperer (10 player)

Defeat the Blood Council without anyone in the raid taking more than 23,000 spell damage in a single hit in 10-player mode.
